snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said its services index fell to 56.9 last month from 59 in August.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its services index dropped to 56.9 in September, from 59 in August; sales fell and new orders plunged.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said its services index fell to 56.9 last month from 59 in August.

headline.main: Survey Indicates Slower Growth in Services Sector
headline.print_headline: Survey Finds a Slowdown of Growth in Services
